books.description: The Grammy Award-winning musician retraces her path to discovering her own worth. Read by Alicia Keys, America Ferrera, Bono et al. 9 hours, 55 minutes unabridged.

books.description: An examination of the leadership of the prime minister Winston Churchill. Read by John Lee and the author. 17 hours and 49 minutes unabridged.

books.contributor: by Tom O'Neill and Dan Piepenbring
books.description: A reassessment of events surrounding the murders committed by Charles Manson’s followers. Read by Kevin Stillwell. 16 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: CHAOS

books.description: From 1945 to 1965, a family in Colorado had 12 children, six of whom went on to develop schizophrenia. Read by Sean Pratt. 13 hours, 8 minutes unabridged.

books.description: Whimsical retelling of Greek myths. Read by the author. 15 hours, 26 minutes unabridged.
books.title: MYTHOS

books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species. Read by Derek Perkins. 15 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.

books.description: An overview of the 1918 flu epidemic and cautionary tale for similar kinds of large-scale outbreaks. Read by Scott Brick. 19 hours, 26 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE GREAT INFLUENZA
